import { ChangeDetectorRef, Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { EmitterService } from './core/emitter.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { isLoading: boolean = false; isLogined: boolean = false; constructor(private emitService: EmitterService, private cdr: ChangeDetectorRef,private router: Router) { this.emitService.loaderEmitter.subscribe(loader => { this.isLoading = loader; this.cdr.detectChanges(); }); } ngOnInit() { let logined = localStorage.getItem('isLogined') == 'True'; this.isLogined = logined; if (!this.isLogined) { this.router.navigate(['/login']); } } isMobileNavVisible: boolean = false; isCompact: boolean = false; dropdowns = [ { label: 'Media', icon: 'fas fa-photo-video', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Recent', 'Images', 'Video'], }, { label: 'Users', icon: 'fas fa-users', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Subscribed', 'Non-subscribed', 'Banned', 'New'], }, { label: 'Payments', icon: 'fas fa-money-check-alt', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Recent', 'Projections'], }, ]; toggleDropdown(dropdown: any): void { // Close all other dropdowns this.dropdowns.forEach((d) => { if (d !== dropdown) { d.isOpen = false; } }); // Toggle the clicked dropdown dropdown.isOpen = !dropdown.isOpen; } }
